name: Magma Elemental Avoidance
description: Reduces the damage your pet takes from creature area of effect attacks by an additional 0%.

name: Magma Splash
description:
Splashes the target with Magma, melting its armor by 4%, dealing Fire damage and additional 2 Fire damage every 3 seconds for 9 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
Does not stack with other similar effects.

name: Molten Blast
description: Unleashes a wave of magma inflicting 2 to 11 Fire damage to nearby enemies.

name: Stomp
description: Leap forward towards the target, stomping the ground dealing 2 to 11 Fire damage and knocking the target and nearby enemies within a 8 radius into the air.

name: Acid Spit
description: Your worm spits acid at an enemy, causing 8 to 12 Nature damage and reducing its armor by 10% per Acid Spit for 30 sec. Can be applied up to 2 times. Does not stack with other similar effects.

name: Bite
description: Bite the enemy, causing 4 to 6 damage.
